content:
Hi everyone !
I am new to this community and I would like to get an advice on a issue (hope I am posting on the right channel). We have set up a dataverse for our University and we want to get harvested by others. We have enabled the "harvesting server" and created a few sets and it works, we are harvested by some other repositories. Nevertheless, we have an issue, the https://dataverse.uliege.be/oai gives an internal error while the https://dataverse.uliege.be/oai?verb=Identify works fine (and we have been harvested so it seems to work). Do you know the origin of the error and how to solve it ? The people of OpenAIRE asked me to look into it to be able to get harvested. I am not a developper, just a data manager so do not hesitate to explain it to me with lots of details :)
Thank you !
Lyne

@Lyne Van de Vyvere hi! Welcome to the Dataverse community!

You seem to be running Dataverse 5.11.1 according to https://dataverse.uliege.be/api/info/version

I know we put in a fix at #10205 for Dataverse 6.2 that eliminated similar errors. I think upgrading will resolve the error for you. I hope that isn't too many details! :smile: Sometimes I can't help myself! :smile:
